data.message: Lord...your trump diss was so pathetic...once you become a crybaby liberal tho everything goes downhill. Don’t feel sorry for ya either.

replies.message: Wasn't the main aspect of the diss, if he wanted he could of genuinely destroyed him but it's the fact that Trump's racist ass pissed him off so much that he didn't care. It was sort of a rant
Pathetic because it triggered you. It's not impossible to throw a kickass diss at Trump you know.
Zedd Ghafoor explain how trump is racist.....
Tina Ann Kuivenhoven get back in the kitchen before your husband finds out you're on facebook!
Casey Leiker...I’m a woman...that can at least get rid of face acne and straighten my hair...get your shit together girl before you think you can try to be funny. Ha.
Tina Ann Kuivenhoven watchout,if ur husband knows that trump grabs u by the pus... idk if he is considered your husband anymore
Martir Hasani lol what? You’re kinda stupid...that was more lame than Eminem’s sad rap. Lol
Sorry and sexist

Lord Your just triggered. He dont need you to feel sorry for him hell go down in history as one of the greatest music artists of all time. You on the other hand is just a butthurt trump lover that has their panties in a bunch

Okime Nebar an...I was a loyal fan but when someone tells me they don’t want my business just because of politics..fuck them! I did nothing to this pansy...he needs to get it right and realize a lot of his white republican fans have been buying his music. Not now! How else should I take a big fuck you thrown at me? A fuck you right back!
I don't really think that anybody cares that you're upset about him saying not to be his fan
Tina Ann Kuivenhoven I didn’t realize my curly hair made me a man. Shocking.
Tina Ann i suggest you to stf cause your point is useless now, first take a look at yourself then criticize 😉
